thread.title: 'Shaandaar' like 'Romantic-Fairytale' might not happen for long time, says Shahi
thread.title_full: 'Shaandaar' like 'Romantic-Fairytale' might not happen for long time, says Shahi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Shaandaar' like 'Romantic-Fairytale' might not happen for long time, says Shahi
text: New Delhi, Oct 13 (ANI): Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor seems pretty happy about the fact that he has got a chance to work in 'Shaandaar' along with Alia Bhatt . However, he expressed that it is unlikely to foresee any such genre and story, coming in near future. The 34-year-old actor along with his co-star was spotted promoting his movie with Tourism to Britain. He also expressed that though the shoot for Shaandaar is over and the movie is all set to release, he can be spotted next with Alia in his upcoming flick, 'Udta Punjab'. Directed by Vikas Bahl, 'Shaandaar' is all set to release on October 22. Â»
